short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears clipboard after exiting incognito mode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clear your clipboard after exiting an incognito tab or window.  Make sure to allow this addon in incognito mode or it won't do anything.

Seems like no one thinks this should be a feature of incognito mode:
https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=46131
https://www.ghacks.net/2014/07/24/mozilla-changes-private-browsing-clipboard-handling-firefox-33/
